git-stage(1)

NAME

git-stage - Add file contents to the staging area


SYNOPSIS
--------
[verse]
'git stage' args...


DESCRIPTION
-----------

This is a synonym for git-add[1].  Please refer to the
documentation of that command.

GIT
---
Part of the git[1] suite
